title: Unable to connect to the game sometimes
body:
Every 20ish games i have been getting this issue where i get to the loading screen but a popup comes up and says "unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to our game" but there is no problem with my network. It just chooses a game that im not allowed to play every once in awhile and has made me loose LP several times. I have tried closing the game and reopening no issues logging in but still cant connect to the game, i even restarted my computer once to no avail. Every instance of this problem i can find online is a good few years old and all of the solves have not worked for me. I don't have an anti virus or anything and i have allowed it through my firewall but i still cant reconnect to the game. I just have to wait until the game is finished then the next game usually is fine.

Help please

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

First I would recommend trying any fixes int hat article that you haven't already, as well as running a basic client repair.

I'd probably stick to normals for a few games to see if it's working out, and if not, submit a ticket to player support detailing the issue: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
